input.prompt:
Black-and-white coloring book page for print.
STYLE:
[Describe the vibe. Include outline-only and easy to color.]
Vibe: bold geometric glam outline-only, easy to color. Color: color.
TEXT (exact):
[Main quote EXACT — do not alter text.]
Bold Lines
[Secondary line EXACT — omit if none.]
GO
TYPOGRAPHY:
Bold bubble letters; thick outlines.
Glitter outline only (no shading).
Font: block. Stroke: 8px.
LAYOUT:
US Letter 8.5x11 portrait. Left-align the quote. Line 1 headline; line 2 below.
Keep generous whitespace; treat blank space intentional.
List items: 1. Focus; 2. Create (Gutter: loose).
all numbers vertically aligned; all text left-aligned; treat blank space as intentional; do not fill empty space.
DECORATIONS:
Decorations: dense outline icons. Illustrations: scene outlines. Shading: hatch. Border: decorative 10px.
OUTPUT:
Crisp vector-like linework. Colored outlines on white. Printable.
NEGATIVE PROMPT:
no gradients
no filled shapes
no extra words
